UClub Shuttle

Description:

The UClub Shuttle leaves campus and travels to UClub in University Plaza, while also making stops at Meadows, Hayes, and Washington Dr & Lehigh Av enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The UClub Shuttle runs in the morning, afternoon, and night rush hours from 8:45 A.M. until 11:15 P.M. (Fridays) or 11:30 P.M. (Monday-Thursdays).


Weekends:
The UClub Shuttle runs from 9:00 A.M. to 11:15 P.M.

Notes:

In between the hours of 7:30a and 9:30p, please use the ITC-UClub Shuttle (IU) for service to/from UClub, Meadows, Hayes, Washington Dr & Lehigh Av, and Binghamton University.


Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.
